## git

### FAQs

* unstage files but don't undo the changes

### terminology

**HEAD** = the snapshot of your last commit on that branch

**index** = staging area = your proposed next commit

**working directory** = **working tree** = a sandbox, where you can try changes out before committing them to your staging area (index)

### reset

```sh
git reset

git reset HEAD
git reset HEAD~1
git reset HEAD~2

git reset --hard
git reset --hard HEAD

git reset --soft
git reset --soft HEAD

git reset --mixed
```
